alert.note: Alert for Rockingham; Stokes (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 6:01PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Stokes and northwestern Rockingham Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 600 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Prestonville to King. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mayodan... Madison... Walnut Cove... Stoneville... Danbury... King... and Pine Hall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
